title: Huckabee on Obama “Cherishing” Religious Liberties: He has “Gone After” and “Harrassed” Christians Over and Over | Tom Sullivan Radio Show
text: While welcoming the Pope to the White House this morning, President Obama stressed the importance of “religious liberty”. He even said our country "cherishes" it. However, many American Christians say the President isn’t doing enough to protect their religious rights! In fact, some say
